page.title: Provento — a facility solution providers' new visual identity for a push on the market
page.desc: As a facility solutions provider wants to make a push on the market they were looking for a fresh and modern look to their visual identity. The revision included an complete redesign of all visual elements of the company.
page.overview: Provento works as a facility solution provider. Meaning, their work consist of creating custom solutions for customers who require facility services. As they aimed for a break on the marked they found themselves in need of a visual revision.
page.research:
Before the actual design process started, an interview with the company owners was conducted with the business owners to understand the companys' brand's core identity, target audience, and long term goals to try to shape that into the visual design itself

 The interview showed that the company wanted something that felt modern and that would stand out from competitors on the market. The company also wanted to offer more than a service, but a full facility solution for their customers.
